tip.title: Tip of the Day
tip.text: Tip of the Day is a new feature to Cockatrice that allows users to get information about the newest features of the program and some of the most commonly asked questions!

tip.title: Suggesting New Tips
tip.text: You can suggest new Tips of the Day by reaching out to the development team on Gitter!

tip.title: Reporting Bugs
tip.text: If you encounter a bug while using Cockatrice, you can report the bug to the development team via <a href="https://github.com/cockatrice/cockatrice/issues">GitHub<a>

tip.title: FAQ/Troubleshooting Wiki
tip.text: You can find answers to the most common questions and some helpful Cockatrice toubleshooting over on the <a href="https://github.com/cockatrice/cockatrice/wiki">GitHub wiki<a>

tip.title: Register for a Server
tip.text: Click on either Cockatrice (Windows) or Actions (Mac) and then Register to server... When the dialogue appears, fill out the desired server information.

tip.title: Drawing Arrows
tip.text: You can draw arrows of different color by holding a combination of keys! Right Click: Red Arrow Shift + Right Click: Green Arrow Alt + Right Click: Blue Arrow Cmd + Right Click: Yellow Arrow

tip.title: Filtering Games
tip.text: Don't see all the active games? Want to see a smaller selection? Use the Game Filters to change your horizon

tip.title: Upload Custom Avatar
tip.text: Want to show off your hippo avatar? Need to update your password? Check out the Accounts Tab for more info!

tip.title: Common Shortcuts
tip.text:
You can find a full list of shortcuts on the wiki, but a short list:
Roll a die: CTRL + I
Mulligan: CTRL + M
Draw a card: CTRL + D
Undo a draw: CTRL + SHIFT + D
View Sideboard: CTRL + F3
Change Life: CTRL + L
All shortcuts can be customized via Settings->Shortcuts!

tip.title: Changing Themes
tip.text: Did you know Cockatrice has custom themes? You can either create one yourself or use one of the several pre-loaded ones! Go to Settings->Appearance and try them out!

tip.title: Flip of the Coin
tip.text: You can flip a coin instead of rolling a die by rolling a 2 sided die instead!

tip.title: Face Down Cards
tip.text: You can hold Shift while dragging or clicking on a card to have it enter play face down

tip.title: Counter expressions
tip.text:
When setting a counter value, you can type a math expression in the box and the counter will be set to the result.
The "x" variable contains the current counter value.
